name: Diver Dave (Saves the Sea
description:
(If the WebGL version is not working eg. menu not opening, please download the other game file)

Made for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam

In this game you play as a diver called Dave. Your goal is to save the ocean of the junk and get the sick fish to safety. 

At first your diving gear is not good enough to swin very deep but as you play and gather coins, you can upgrade it and swin deeper and deeper. 

Controls:

You move by holding your left mouse button towards the desired direction.

You can gather trash or sick fish by swimming into them. Be carefull, because if you pick up the regular healthy fish, you will lose coins.

You can press F to open up your menu to go back to the main menu, upgrade gear or rebirth.
